metadata.title: CVE-2017-18009 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In OpenCV 3.3.1, a heap-based buffer over-read exists in the functioncv::HdrDecoder::checkSignature in modules/imgcodecs/src/grfmt_hdr.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18009` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm1
libopencv-contrib3.2 - 3.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1+esm1
